AppointmentMainScreen.OtoInfo: Diagnosis and treatment of diseases of the ear, nose, throat and allergies
AppointmentMainScreen.NeuInfo: Diagnosis and treatment of diseases of the system and respiratory tract and lungs

AppointmentPro.personalized: Each of our patients receives personalized attention, our doctors are in charge of analyzing each of the cases in detail to always provide the appropriate diagnosis, which is why the following methodology is taken into account at each appointment
AppointmentPro.assigned: Treatment assigned in a period of time

Gastro.text1: Medical professionals who have received training in the diagnosis and treatment of diseases of the stomach, intestine and walls.
Gastro.text3: These surgeons see a wide range of diseases and pathologies related to problems of the stomach or intestinal walls.
Gastro.text4: It is an inflammation of the appendix, a finger-shaped pouch that projects from the colon on the lower right side of the abdomen.
Gastro.text5: It is an increase in the frequency of bowel movements (more than three per day) accompanied by a decrease in their consistency.
Gastro.text6: Patients with celiac disease do not tolerate a protein called gluten (wheat, oats, barley, rye).
Gastro.text7: Difficulty holding a bowel movement. You have dribbling of solid or liquid stool when you least expect it.
Gastro.text8: All patients are analyzed for a more accurate diagnosis and personalized treatment
Gastro.text9: When I see the smile of my patients, that is the true reward
Gastro.text11: Graduated from the Faculty of Medicine of the UNAM
Gastro.text12: She is active in gastroenterology medical societies

Oto.text1: These doctors see a wide range of diseases and pathologies related to the senses, such as smell and taste problems or balance and hearing disorders.
Oto.text3: These surgeons see a wide range of diseases and pathologies related to hearing and smell problems.
Oto.text4: Irritations due to allergies, colds, sneezing, or sinus problems. Very cold or dry air.
Oto.text5: Hearing loss can be mild, moderate, severe, or profound caused by a variety of factors.
Oto.text6: It is the inflammation of the voice box (larynx) due to excessive use, irritation or infection and that can become chronic.
Oto.text7: Sinusitis occurs when fluid builds up in the sinuses (cavities in the face that are filled with air).
Oto.text8: All patients are analyzed for a more accurate diagnosis and personalized treatment
Oto.text9: My priority is patients and the satisfaction of parents seeing their children grow up healthy
Oto.text11: Graduated from the University of Spain
Oto.text12: He is an expert in middle ear surgery

Neu.text1: Medical professionals who have received specialization in the study, diagnosis and treatment of diseases related to the respiratory system.
Neu.text3: These surgeons see a wide range of diseases and pathologies related to problems of the respiratory system.
Neu.text4: Asthma causes wheezing, shortness of breath, chest tightness, and coughing at night or early in the morning.
Neu.text5: Acute bronchitis is usually caused by inflammation of the airways due to viral infections.
Neu.text6: Infection affecting one or both lungs. It causes the air sacs, or alveoli, in the lungs to fill with fluid or pus.
Neu.text7: Chronic cough is defined as a cough that lasts for more than 3 weeks and can lead to bronchitis or more serious complications.
Neu.text8: All patients are analyzed for a more accurate diagnosis and personalized treatment
Neu.text9: Health is the source of happiness, and taking care of it early is my priority
Neu.text11: Graduated from the University of Madrid
Neu.text12: Active member of pulmonology medical societies
